item.title: JSON Schema parser & code generator
item.description:
json-schema generates Go struct from a JSON Schema specification.

Decimal types are supported for accurate currency calculation.

item.title: Schemata: database scheme extractor & code generator in Go
item.description:
Database scheme extractor & code generator in Go. Supported database:

  1. MySQL
  2. SQLite

item.title: xsd: XML tagged struct generator for Go
item.description: xsd is a Go package that generates tagged struct from XML Schema (xsd). When only the XML file is available, an xsd file can be automatically generated by a XML Schema learner, such as “github.com/kore/XML-Schema-learner”.
